roleset.name: to modify the manner or appearance, to conceal

example.name: transitive
example.text: Appropriations committees have used an assortment of devices [*]to disguise as much as $ 1 billion [*U*] in spending , and as critics have awakened to these devices , the bill can seem like a wounded caribou trying [*] to make it past ice and wolves [*-3] to reach safer winter grazing .

example.name: passive
example.text: The jury found them guilty of conspiracy in [*] obtaining the payments , some of which-3 *T*-3 were disguised [*] as fees for consulting services from Mrs. Garcia .
example.arg: as fees for consulting services from Mrs. Garcia

roleset.note: DISGUISE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls fill-9.8. (from disguise.01-v)
